Description:

AE Virtual Class, a member of the Academia Europea business group, a leader in language teaching, with 56 years of experience and the largest teaching staff in the Americas! We are looking for language enthusiasts who want to be part of our extended family! Experience is NOT a requirement! We teach you how to teach!


Job Requirements:

Laptop (with webcam).

Stable internet connection (15 Mbps).

Attitude.

Dynamism.

Advanced knowledge of French or German or Italian or Mandarin or Japanese.

Evening hours. (GMT -6)


Main responsibilities:

Motivate students.

Generate interest in cultures and languages.

Prepare reports.

Evaluations.



Please mention the word **INNOVATION** and tag RMzguNjguMTM0LjE5NA== when applying to show you read the job post completely (#RMzguNjguMTM0LjE5NA==). This is a beta feature to avoid spam applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this and see they're human.
